title: Watch Luke Bryan sing the National Anthem before Super Bowl LI
text: Watch Luke Bryan sing the National Anthem before Super Bowl LI Watch Luke Bryan sing the National Anthem before Super Bowl LI The country music singer got things underway at NRG Stadium in Houston.
